backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining file, folder, mission, and user profile types with storage, access control, and creation/query logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a link-opening flow fix and listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation of the v114 baseline creation process ensuring 1:1 parity with Live version 114.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the main React script.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice stating no modifications are allowed post‑restoration without explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, network-first fetch handling, and cache cleanup for the PWA.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying all frontend files and behaviors match Live version 114 after restoration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring providers and showing either an intro screen after login or the HomePage.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: Error UI component showing initialization failures with retry, sign-out options, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Animated SVG icon with interactive hover effects for gallery targeting visuals.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed decorative horizontal line near the bottom of the screen.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file fails to open externally, offering retry and download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog component that previews files by type and provides actions like download, open, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles uploading files and creating link-based entries with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI, with disabled and hover states.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Dialog to list, create, rename, and delete folders with swipe actions and validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying a copyright message and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full-screen viewer for browsing files with swipe navigation and actions like download, share, move, and delete.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a grid of files with selection, previews, long‑press actions, and integration with fullscreen viewer and file operations.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A header with theme toggle, authentication dropdown, app title, and a global progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: An animated welcome screen that plays a timed intro and then triggers completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: A dialog shown when a link fails to open, offering retry and copy‑to‑clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button that triggers Internet Identity login and shows a loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor with title, tasks, progress, file viewing, and mission update/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: A dialog for creating missions with title input and task list management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: A floating button that opens the missions view, with hover animations and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full‑screen missions list with creation, deletion, progress display, and navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: A layout wrapper that renders children inside a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for listing missions and moving selected file IDs into a chosen mission, with loading and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files into folders or returning them to the main collection, showing folder list and handling move actions.
Swipeable row component enabling edit/delete actions with pointer gesture handling and open/close state logic.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Displays a global upload progress bar when uploads are active, showing percentage and item count.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with branding graphics and messaging plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Context managing backend actor initialization with retry logic, error handling, and identity-based setup.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Context that tracks upload batches, progress, and provides functions to start uploads and update or complete them.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse (touch) pointer and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines mission-related React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides file and folder React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and modifying file and folder data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS setup and extensive theme variables for light and dark modes, including notes and missions color schemes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging Tailwind class names with clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the main app page, handling authentication state, actor readiness, data fetching, UI sections, and optional smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Defines standardized actor initialization error messages and utilities to detect readiness, initialization, token, and canister-stopped errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Provides helpers to open URLs in new tabs with popup-block detection and to download files via fetch and blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Determines how files should open based on MIME type, supporting in-app viewing, Office previews, or direct downloads.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type and provides previewability checks and human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Offers React Query cache diagnostics and logging helpers for mission delete mutations plus basic actor error formatting.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs backend smoke tests for folder creation, mission creation, file upload, and list validation, returning step-based results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and plugin setup.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list enumerating all frontend files included in the v114 baseline.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and a single existing feature focused on fixing incorrect fallback behavior when opening gallery links. Marks the project as a fix request with no new feature requests.
